title: فستان سواريه
description:
فستان سواريه ينفع اخت العروسة واخت العريس والبيست فريند 
 
يلبس لحد ١٠٠ كيلو مرتاح جدا وطول لحد ١٧٠ 
 
واسع بيغطي أي ديفوهات 
 
شيفون دوبل كلوش متبطن بالكامل وفي شغل على منطقة الصدر شيك وراقي جدا بالإضافة لإكستنشن شيفون على الذراع 
 
هايل ويديكي إطلالة مميزة في مناسبتك وسعر بيع زي الايجار بالظبط ..

title: Wedding Dress
description:
Wedding dress, worn for only two hours on the wedding day. 
 
Includes a 3-meter veil. 
 
Fits up to 65 kg.
rich_text_description: Wedding dress, worn for only two hours on the wedding day. Includes a 3-meter veil. Fits up to 65 kg.

title: Burgundy Chiffon Evening Gown with Beaded Details
description: Elevate your formal wardrobe with our Burgundy Chiffon Evening Gown. This dress combines classic simplicity with dazzling details, featuring a high round neckline adorned with intricate crystal beadwork that eliminates the need for a necklace. Matching embellished bands at the waist and cuffs add a cohesive touch of sparkle. The skirt flows gently in an A-line cut, offering a comfortable and modest fit perfect for weddings, galas, and special occasions.

title: Emerald Green Long Sleeve Chiffon Gown
description: Exude timeless sophistication in our Emerald Green Long Sleeve Chiffon Gown. Designed with a focus on modest elegance, this dress features a rich forest green hue that flatters every skin tone. The bodice is artfully constructed with diagonal pleats and structured, ruched shoulders that add a touch of vintage glamour. Finished with a defined waistbelt and a flowing, floor-length skirt, this gown offers a lightweight, airy feel perfect for weddings, engagements, and formal dinners.

title: Champagne Beaded Chiffon Evening Gown
description: Shine with understated elegance in this Champagne Beaded Chiffon Evening Gown. Designed for the modern woman who seeks both style and modesty, this formal dress features a fully embellished bodice with shimmering beadwork arranged in a striking linear pattern. The fitted waist transitions seamlessly into a soft, A-line chiffon skirt with a side drape that adds movement and grace. Perfect for weddings, engagement parties, and formal events, this gown offers a sophisticated, fully lined silhouette.

title: Ethereal Gold Embellished Modest Gown
description: Step into the spotlight with the Ethereal Gold Embellished Modest Gown. This dress captures the essence of understated luxury with its soft, neutral palette and exquisite craftsmanship. The dazzling embellishments on the chest and sleeves catch the light with every movement, eliminating the need for a necklace. Below the waist, the fabric cascades into a soft A-line skirt, enhanced by artistic ruching at the hip to accentuate your shape while maintaining a modest profile. A truly regal piece for your most memorable occasions.

title: Sleeve Modest Formal Dress with Overskirt
description: Elevate your evening wardrobe with our Navy Blue Beaded Satin Evening Gown. Designed for sophistication and grace, this formal dress features a structured bodice adorned with shimmering vine-patterned beadwork that extends down the long sleeves. The high neckline and full coverage make it an ideal choice for modest evening wear or hijabi formal attire. The skirt is crafted from premium satin, featuring a unique split-overlay design that creates a dramatic, flowing train effect while you walk. Perfect for weddings, galas, and black-tie events.

description: Elevate your evening wardrobe with our Navy Blue Beaded Satin Evening Gown. Designed for sophistication and grace, this formal dress features a structured bodice adorned with shimmering vine-patterned beadwork that extends down the long sleeves. The high neckline and full coverage make it an ideal choice for modest evening wear or hijabi formal attire. The skirt is crafted from premium satin, featuring a unique split-overlay design that creates a dramatic, flowing train effect while you walk. Perfect for weddings, galas, and black-tie events.

title: Olive Green Pearl Embellished Chiffon Gown
description: Grace any occasion with our Olive Green Pearl Embellished Chiffon Gown. This dress stands out with its charming vintage-inspired details, including a high neckline and structured puff shoulders. The bodice is adorned with delicate white pearls and beads arranged in scattered floral motifs, leading down to a distinctive scalloped hem at the waist. The skirt flows in soft gathers, offering a comfortable and modest silhouette ideal for daytime events, baby showers, or formal gatherings.

title: Cream Pleated Chiffon Evening Gown
description: Exude ethereal grace in our Cream Pleated Chiffon Evening Gown. This dress creates a dreamy silhouette with its floor-length, accordion-pleated skirt that floats as you walk. The bodice features a delicate overlay of floral embroidery in soft white tones, adding texture and elegance without overpowering the look. Finished with billowy long sleeves and fitted cuffs, this gown is a timeless choice for formal dinners, engagements, or upscale daytime events.

title: Metallic Gold Long Sleeve Evening Gown
description: Make a radiant statement in our Metallic Gold Long Sleeve Evening Gown. This show-stopping dress features a lustrous, light-catching fabric that mimics the look of liquid gold. The bodice is designed with a flattering crossover wrap detail that leads into a defined waist, creating an elegant hourglass shape. The skirt flares out into a full, pleated A-line silhouette that sways beautifully with every step. Perfect for weddings, galas, and festive holiday parties where you want to shine.

title: Evening Dress with Crystal
description:
Radiate elegance and grace in this stunning Emerald Green Evening Gown. 
Designed for special occasions where sophistication is key, this dress combines timeless modesty with luxurious modern details. Crafted from high-quality, flowy chiffon, the dress features a flattering A-line silhouette that moves beautifully with every step. 
The bodice and sleeves are delicately dusted with scattered pearl accents, creating a soft, stardust effect. The true centerpiece of the gown is the exquisite asymmetrical waist overlay, intricately hand-embellished with sparkling crystals and beads to define your shape and add a touch of glamour. 
Key Features: 
 
 
  Luxurious Design: Deep emerald green color with a modest, high-neck cut. 
  Intricate Details: Features scattered pearls across the chest and sleeves, paired with a heavy crystal-beaded waist motif. 
  Elegant Sleeves: Long sleeves with a subtle bell flare and matching beaded trim at the cuffs. 
  Flattering Fit: A comfortable A-line skirt that provides a graceful flow, suitable for various body types. 
  Occasion Ready: Perfect for weddings, engagement parties, galas, and formal events. 
 
Add a touch of royalty to your wardrobe with this masterpiece of modest fashion.

title: Ethereal Lemon Chiffon Gown Dress
description:
Radiate light and elegance in this beautiful Ethereal Lemon Chiffon Gown. Crafted from delicate, flowing chiffon, this dress offers a graceful A-line silhouette perfect for any special occasion. The modest bodice is adorned with scattered hand-applied crystal and sequin detailing that gently shimmers across the chest. 
The most distinctive feature is the dramatic, full-length cape sleeves, where sheer chiffon panels flow gracefully from the back of the shoulders down to the floor. This design creates breathtaking, weightless movement as you walk, flawlessly combining modesty with high-fashion drama. 
 
 
   
Color: Pale Lemon Yellow / Light Citron. 
 
   
Fabric: Flowing Chiffon/Georgette. 
 
   
Design: Dramatic, full-length attached sheer cape sleeves (open drapes). 
 
   
Embellishment: Scattered hand-applied crystal/sequin detailing on the bodice. 
 
   
Style: Ethereal, dramatic, and elegant modest formal wear.

title: Cashmere Rose A-Line Gown Dress
description:
Step out in romantic sophistication with this stunning Cashmere Rose Evening Gown. The flowing A-line silhouette is crafted from soft chiffon, ensuring elegant movement and drape. The modest bodice features a unique and eye-catching asymmetrical crystal design that traces a dramatic diagonal line across the chest and forms a decorative V-shape or 'heart' at the waist. 
This silver beadwork beautifully frames the figure and defines the high waistline. With subtle puff detailing at the shoulders, a high round neckline, and a graceful, pleated skirt, this dress is the epitome of feminine glamour for weddings, formal dinners, and special occasions. 
 
 
   
Color: Dusty Rose / Mauve / Cashmere Pink. 
 
   
Fabric: Flowing Chiffon skirt; structured top. 
 
   
Embellishment: Asymmetrical silver crystal beading forming a dramatic diagonal line and a V-shape at the waist. 
 
   
Design: Defined high waist and subtle puff sleeve detailing. 
 
   
Style: Romantic, feminine, sophisticated modest wear.

title: Slate Gray Regal Gown Dress
description:
Exude refined elegance in this magnificent Slate Blue Evening Gown. Crafted from flowing chiffon, this dress creates a graceful, floor-length silhouette perfect for sophisticated formal events. The entire bodice is designed with intricate diagonal pleating and ruching, which cinches the waist and provides beautiful texture.
The gown is crowned by striking, clustered hand-applied crystal and pearl embellishments on one shoulder, adding a touch of couture glamour. Complementing this is a dramatic full-length asymmetrical chiffon cape/drape that flows from the shoulder, adding spectacular movement. Subtle matching beading at the cuff finishes this truly regal and modest look.


Color: Dusty Blue / Slate Blue / Grey-Blue.


Fabric: Flowing Chiffon/Light Crepe.


Design: Dramatic asymmetrical, full-length attached cape/drape from the shoulder.


Embellishment: Clustered hand-applied crystal and pearl detail on the shoulder and cuffs.


Bodice: Extensive diagonal pleating/ruching.


Style: Regal, dramatic, and sophisticated modest formal wear.

The entire bodice is designed with intricate diagonal pleating and ruching, which cinches the waist and provides beautiful texture.

The gown is crowned by striking, clustered hand-applied crystal and pearl embellishments on one shoulder, adding a touch of couture glamour. Complementing this is a dramatic full-length asymmetrical chiffon cape/drape that flows from the shoulder, adding spectacular movement. Subtle matching beading at the cuff finishes this truly regal and modest look.

  • Color: Dusty Blue / Slate Blue / Grey-Blue.

  • Fabric: Flowing Chiffon/Light Crepe.

  • Design: Dramatic asymmetrical, full-length attached cape/drape from the shoulder.

  • Embellishment: Clustered hand-applied crystal and pearl detail on the shoulder and cuffs.

  • Bodice: Extensive diagonal pleating/ruching.

  • Style: Regal, dramatic, and sophisticated modest formal wear.

title: Asymmetrical Peplum & Crystal Trims Dress
description:
Embrace modern elegance with this unique Contemporary Citron Gown. Crafted from a beautiful, flowing chiffon fabric, this dress features a streamlined silhouette perfect for sophisticated daytime or evening events. The modest, fitted top includes a high neckline and long sleeves. 
Its most striking detail is the asymmetrical waist overlay, which creates a subtle, fashion-forward peplum shape with a curved cutout on the hip. This clean, architectural design is delicately highlighted with minimal crystal tracing along the neckline and the edges of the peplum, adding a touch of quiet sparkle. The chiffon skirt flows beautifully, guaranteeing a graceful and memorable look. 
 
 
   
Color: Pale Yellow / Butter Citron. 
 
   
Fabric: Flowing Chiffon skirt; smooth crepe/jersey top. 
 
   
Design: Unique asymmetrical waist overlay (peplum-style) with a modern, curved cut. 
 
   
Embellishment: Subtle crystal detailing tracing the seams and neckline. 
 
   
Style: Modern minimalist, unique structure, modest formal wear.

title: Chiffon A-Line with Structured Bodice
description:
Step into sophisticated sunshine with this exquisite Pastel Citron Formal Gown. Perfect for spring or summer events, this modest dress features a full, flowing A-line skirt crafted from delicate chiffon, offering beautiful movement and drape. 
The focal point is the structured embroidered bodice, which features a captivating geometric chevron pattern in brilliant white and silver beadwork. The high, defined waist dips subtly to a soft point, creating a highly flattering and elongated silhouette. With its high round neckline and long fitted sleeves, this gown is the epitome of fresh, youthful, and contemporary modest elegance. 
 
 
   
Color: Pale Yellow / Pastel Citron / Light Lime. 
 
   
Fabric: Flowing Chiffon skirt; Structured, beaded bodice. 
 
   
Embellishment: Heavy white/silver beading in a central geometric chevron/zigzag pattern. 
 
   
Silhouette: High-waisted A-line with a defined, pointed bodice cut. 
 
   
Style: Fresh, spring formal, contemporary modesty.

description:
Step into sophisticated sunshine with this exquisite Pastel Citron Formal Gown. Perfect for spring or summer events, this modest dress features a full, flowing A-line skirt crafted from delicate chiffon, offering beautiful movement and drape. 
The focal point is the structured embroidered bodice, which features a captivating geometric chevron pattern in brilliant white and silver beadwork. The high, defined waist dips subtly to a soft point, creating a highly flattering and elongated silhouette. With its high round neckline and long fitted sleeves, this gown is the epitome of fresh, youthful, and contemporary modest elegance. 
 
 
   
Color: Pale Yellow / Pastel Citron / Light Lime. 
 
   
Fabric: Flowing Chiffon skirt; Structured, beaded bodice. 
 
   
Embellishment: Heavy white/silver beading in a central geometric chevron/zigzag pattern. 
 
   
Silhouette: High-waisted A-line with a defined, pointed bodice cut. 
 
   
Style: Fresh, spring formal, contemporary modesty.

title: Hand-Embroidered Crystal Embellishment
description:
Description: Introducing the epitome of luxury and glamour: the Couture Art Deco Gown. This sophisticated black dress is a true wearable masterpiece, featuring incredibly dense, high-quality hand-embroidery using crystal and silver beads across the entire silhouette. 
The intricate beadwork showcases striking geometric and scalloped patterns that create a highly detailed, textured, and elongating effect. The strong, framed bodice design transitions into rhythmic wave patterns down the length of the skirt. The gown maintains a high neckline and long, fully embellished sleeves for a modest, yet utterly breathtaking finish. This garment represents the highest level of craftsmanship and is perfect for the most exclusive red carpet events, luxury weddings, or gala dinners where maximum impact is essential. 
 
 
   
Color: Black base with dazzling Silver/Crystal beadwork. 
 
   
Embellishment: Full-body, dense hand-embroidery using high-grade crystals and beads. 
 
   
Design: Striking Art Deco and geometric patterns (lattice work and scalloped waves). 
 
   
Silhouette: Elegant, straight-cut column design. 
 
   
Craftsmanship: Exceptional detail and luxurious weight, reflecting couture quality.

title: Elegant Plus Size Navy Formal Dress for Weddings & Gala
description:
Elegant Contrast Formal Dress 
Description: Make a sophisticated and sparkling entrance in this stunning Deep Navy Blue Evening Gown, which perfectly balances shimmer and structure. The top half and long sleeves are entirely covered in brilliant, deep navy sequins that catch the light beautifully, ensuring maximum visibility and glamour. 
The high, defined waist transitions seamlessly into a smooth, flowing A-line skirt crafted from luxurious matte satin or crepe. The upper skirt is detailed with subtle, decorative diagonal pintucks that add a tailored touch and flattering structure to the midsection. This gown is a timeless choice for galas, formal weddings, and any event where you wish to combine classic elegance with a touch of modern sparkle. 
 
 
   
Color: Deep Navy Blue / Midnight Blue. 
 
   
Top Detail: Fully sequined bodice and long sleeves with a high round neck. 
 
   
Skirt Detail: Matte satin/crepe skirt with decorative diagonal pintuck detailing for structure. 
 
   
Silhouette: Defined high waist and a graceful A-line flow. 
 
   
Style: Classic elegance, sophisticated contrast, modest formal wear.

title: Elegant Plus Size Navy Formal Dress for Weddings & Gala
description:
Elegant Contrast Formal Dress 
Description: Make a sophisticated and sparkling entrance in this stunning Deep Navy Blue Evening Gown, which perfectly balances shimmer and structure. The top half and long sleeves are entirely covered in brilliant, deep navy sequins that catch the light beautifully, ensuring maximum visibility and glamour. 
The high, defined waist transitions seamlessly into a smooth, flowing A-line skirt crafted from luxurious matte satin or crepe. The upper skirt is detailed with subtle, decorative diagonal pintucks that add a tailored touch and flattering structure to the midsection. This gown is a timeless choice for galas, formal weddings, and any event where you wish to combine classic elegance with a touch of modern sparkle. 
 
 
   
Color: Deep Navy Blue / Midnight Blue. 
 
   
Top Detail: Fully sequined bodice and long sleeves with a high round neck. 
 
   
Skirt Detail: Matte satin/crepe skirt with decorative diagonal pintuck detailing for structure. 
 
   
Silhouette: Defined high waist and a graceful A-line flow. 
 
   
Style: Classic elegance, sophisticated contrast, modest formal wear.

title: Black Modest Evening Dress with Beaded High Neck & Shoulders
description:
Exude timeless Hollywood glamour in this stunning Black Evening Gown. Designed for sophisticated formal events, this dress is crafted from a comfortable, flowing fabric that drapes beautifully. The silhouette features a high mock neck and a beautifully draped bodice, structured with flattering diagonal ruching that cinches the waist and flows into a graceful, floor-length skirt. 
The gown is accented by striking white and silver beading, concentrated in an asymmetrical pattern along the shoulder and high neckline, providing a dramatic focal point. The long sleeves finish in chic bell cuffs, which are elegantly embellished with rows of matching pearls and beads, adding the perfect touch of sparkle to this essential black-tie look. 
 
 
   
Color: Classic Black. 
 
   
Neckline: High mock neck. 
 
   
Embellishment: Asymmetrical pearl and crystal beading on the shoulder/neckline. 
 
   
Design: Flattering diagonal ruching/draping across the bodice and waist. 
 
   
Sleeves: Long sleeves with subtle bell-shaped, pearl-embellished cuffs. 
 
   
Style: Modern sophisticated, modest formal wear.

title: Nude Formal Modest Evening Dress with High Neck Cape
description:
Product Description: The Ethereal Chiffon Cape Gown 
  
 
Step into a fairy tale with this absolutely ethereal and sophisticated modest evening gown. 
 
Crafted from lightweight, flowing chiffon in a beautiful nude/light beige hue, 
 
this dress is designed to make a graceful and unforgettable statement at any special event. 
 
  
 Design Highlights & Features 
  
 
  Integrated High-Neck Cape: The signature feature is the stunning attached sheer chiffon cape. 
 
It elegantly flows from the high-neck collar down the back and arms, 
 
Then providing an extra layer of modesty and creating a dramatic, sweeping silhouette. 
 
  adding a delicate sparkle and texture that catches the light beautifully without being overpowering. 
  Elegant High Neckline: A sophisticated high collar (or mock neck) provides a chic frame for the face and ensures full coverage, 
  perfect for modest styling. 
  Flattering Silhouette: The dress features a fitted bodice that gently flows into a pleated or gathered A-line skirt, 
  offering a universally flattering fit that drapes beautifully and provides maximum comfort. 
  Soft & Romantic Fabric: The use of flowing chiffon ensures the dress has beautiful movement and a soft,and romantic quality, enhancing the overall majestic feel. 
 
  
 Occasion and Styling 
  
 
This luxurious light-colored gown is perfectly suited for celebratory events: 
 
  Weddings (especially as a guest, or for the Mother-of-the-Bride/Groom) 
  Engagement or Henna Parties 
  Formal Gala Events and Balls 
  Award Ceremonies 
 
Styling Tip: Pair this gown with soft metallics like rose gold or silver, and a light, 
 
elegant hijab/headscarf in a matching or complementary neutral shade.

  • Elegant High Neckline: A sophisticated high collar (or mock neck) provides a chic frame for the face and ensures full coverage,
  • perfect for modest styling.
  • Flattering Silhouette: The dress features a fitted bodice that gently flows into a pleated or gathered A-line skirt,
  • offering a universally flattering fit that drapes beautifully and provides maximum comfort.
  • Soft & Romantic Fabric: The use of flowing chiffon ensures the dress has beautiful movement and a soft,and romantic quality, enhancing the overall majestic feel.
 

 Occasion and Styling

  This luxurious light-colored gown is perfectly suited for celebratory events:
  • Weddings (especially as a guest, or for the Mother-of-the-Bride/Groom)
  • Engagement or Henna Parties
  • Formal Gala Events and Balls
  • Award Ceremonies
Styling Tip: Pair this gown with soft metallics like rose gold or silver, and a light, elegant hijab/headscarf in a matching or complementary neutral shade.

title: Luxury Ivory Beaded Modest Kaftan Gown - Wedding Ready
description:
Step into the spotlight in this breathtaking Ivory Formal Gown, a perfect choice for modern brides, engagement parties, or high-end formal events. This dress masterfully combines a simple, elegant silhouette with exquisite, all-over shimmer. The flowing, matte ivory skirt is beautifully complemented by a modest bodice and long, fitted sleeves crafted from a sheer, shimmering mesh fabric. 
The mesh is intricately decorated with subtle silver sequin detailing forming a chic, abstract pattern. The most striking element is the integrated cape-style overlay, where the shimmering mesh extends gracefully from the sides and shoulders down to the floor, lending an air of weightless luxury and dramatic movement to the entire look. 
 
 
   
Color: Soft Ivory / Off-White. 
 
   
Embellishment: Subtle, abstract silver sequin/shimmer detailing across the sheer overlay and bodice. 
 
   
Design: Integrated sheer overlay creating a flowing, open cape/drape from the shoulders to the floor. 
 
   
Fabric: Matte inner lining with a shimmering, sheer outer layer for contrast. 
 
   
Style: Bridal elegance, modest, and ethereal.

This dress masterfully combines a simple, elegant silhouette with exquisite, all-over shimmer. The flowing, matte ivory skirt is beautifully complemented by a modest bodice and long, fitted sleeves crafted from a sheer, shimmering mesh fabric. 
The mesh is intricately decorated with subtle silver sequin detailing forming a chic, abstract pattern. The most striking element is the integrated cape-style overlay, where the shimmering mesh extends gracefully from the sides and shoulders down to the floor, lending an air of weightless luxury and dramatic movement to the entire look. 
 
 
   
Color: Soft Ivory / Off-White. 
 
   
Embellishment: Subtle, abstract silver sequin/shimmer detailing across the sheer overlay and bodice. 
 
   
Design: Integrated sheer overlay creating a flowing, open cape/drape from the shoulders to the floor. 
 
   
Fabric: Matte inner lining with a shimmering, sheer outer layer for contrast. 
 
   
Style: Bridal elegance, modest, and ethereal.
variant: 'product-condition:New — Styliiiish Certified🔥/Used – Very Good — Styliiiish Certified ❤️:New — Styliiiish Certified🔥'

title: Sophisticated Modest Formal Dress - Black Evening Abaya
description:
Product Description: The Elegant Black Lace & Pleat Abaya 
  
 
Embrace sophisticated elegance with this exquisite Black Modest Gown, a timeless piece that blends traditional charm with contemporary design. Perfect for the woman who appreciates refined details and a graceful silhouette, this dress ensures you look effortlessly chic at any event. 
 
  
 Design Highlights & Features 
  
 
  Classic Black Hue: The deep, universally flattering black color exudes sophistication and makes this dress incredibly versatile for various formal and semi-formal occasions. 
  Intricate Pleated Bodice: The bodice is beautifully designed with fine, delicate pleats that create texture and visual interest, drawing the eye upwards. A subtle embroidered accent at the neckline adds a touch of understated luxury. 
  Delicate Embroidered Lace Sleeves: The long sleeves are a true highlight, crafted from sheer, embroidered lace with intricate floral patterns. They finish in a graceful bell cuff, adding a romantic and feminine touch. 
  Comfortable & Flattering Fit: The dress features a modest, relaxed fit through the body that flows into a comfortable A-line skirt, providing a flattering silhouette for all body types while ensuring ease of movement. 
  Quality Fabric Blend: Crafted from a combination of smooth, high-quality fabric for the main body and delicate lace for the sleeves, this gown offers both luxurious appeal and comfortable wear. 
 
  
 Occasion and Styling 
  
 
This elegant black gown is wonderfully versatile and suitable for a range of events: 
 
  Formal Dinners and Evening Gatherings 
  Engagement Parties and Henna Celebrations 
  Weddings (as a guest) 
  Corporate Events 
  Chic Everyday Wear when you want to make an impression. 
 
Styling Tip: Pair with a simple, elegant hijab in a complementary neutral tone (like the model's beige) and minimal silver or pearl accessories to let the details of the dress shine.

rich_text_description:
Product Description: The Elegant Black Lace & Pleat Abaya

  Embrace sophisticated elegance with this exquisite Black Modest Gown, a timeless piece that blends traditional charm with contemporary design. Perfect for the woman who appreciates refined details and a graceful silhouette, this dress ensures you look effortlessly chic at any event.  

 Design Highlights & Features

 
  • Classic Black Hue: The deep, universally flattering black color exudes sophistication and makes this dress incredibly versatile for various formal and semi-formal occasions.
  • Intricate Pleated Bodice: The bodice is beautifully designed with fine, delicate pleats that create texture and visual interest, drawing the eye upwards. A subtle embroidered accent at the neckline adds a touch of understated luxury.
  • Delicate Embroidered Lace Sleeves: The long sleeves are a true highlight, crafted from sheer, embroidered lace with intricate floral patterns. They finish in a graceful bell cuff, adding a romantic and feminine touch.
  • Comfortable & Flattering Fit: The dress features a modest, relaxed fit through the body that flows into a comfortable A-line skirt, providing a flattering silhouette for all body types while ensuring ease of movement.
  • Quality Fabric Blend: Crafted from a combination of smooth, high-quality fabric for the main body and delicate lace for the sleeves, this gown offers both luxurious appeal and comfortable wear.
 

 Occasion and Styling

  This elegant black gown is wonderfully versatile and suitable for a range of events:
  • Formal Dinners and Evening Gatherings
  • Engagement Parties and Henna Celebrations
  • Weddings (as a guest)
  • Corporate Events
  • Chic Everyday Wear when you want to make an impression.

title: Emerald Green Beaded Modest Evening Dress
description:
Product Description: The Regal Emerald Sequin Gown 
  
 
Step into the spotlight with this absolutely captivating Emerald Green Modest Gown, designed to deliver maximum impact and elegance. This luxurious dress combines a rich, jewel-toned color with intricate detailing and a unique silhouette, making it the ultimate choice for your most exclusive events. 
 
  
 Design Highlights & Features 
  
 
  Rich Emerald Color: The deep, vibrant Emerald Green hue is flattering on every skin tone and immediately conveys luxury and royalty, setting this gown apart. 
  All-Over Sequin Embroidery: The dress boasts an incredible display of sequin and bead embroidery forming a delicate, flowing pattern across the skirt and long sleeves. This creates brilliant sparkle and texture, ensuring you shine from every angle. 
  Dramatic Overlay Skirt: A defining feature is the beautiful, draped satin overlay skirt. It cascades open at the front, framing the sequined inner layer and adding volume, drama, and a flattering layered effect. 
  Elegant Bodice Detailing: The high-neck bodice features sophisticated diagonal pleating across the front, creating a beautiful focal point and adding structure. A simple satin belt highlights the natural waistline. 
  Full Modesty and Comfort: Designed with full-length sleeves and a high neckline, this gown offers complete coverage. The comfortable fit allows for movement while maintaining a supremely elegant and modest profile, ideal for plus-size wearers. 
 
  
 Occasion and Styling 
  
 
This luxurious, eye-catching gown is perfectly suited for high-stakes formal events: 
 
  Black-Tie Weddings (as a guest or bridal party member) 
  Formal Gala Dinners 
  Major Holiday Celebrations (e.g., Eid, Christmas) 
  Anniversaries or Milestone Birthdays 
 
Styling Tip: Pair with simple gold or silver accessories to let the richness of the green and the sparkle of the sequins truly take center stage.

  • All-Over Sequin Embroidery: The dress boasts an incredible display of sequin and bead embroidery forming a delicate, flowing pattern across the skirt and long sleeves. This creates brilliant sparkle and texture, ensuring you shine from every angle.
  • Dramatic Overlay Skirt: A defining feature is the beautiful, draped satin overlay skirt. It cascades open at the front, framing the sequined inner layer and adding volume, drama, and a flattering layered effect.
  • Elegant Bodice Detailing: The high-neck bodice features sophisticated diagonal pleating across the front, creating a beautiful focal point and adding structure. A simple satin belt highlights the natural waistline.
  • Full Modesty and Comfort: Designed with full-length sleeves and a high neckline, this gown offers complete coverage. The comfortable fit allows for movement while maintaining a supremely elegant and modest profile, ideal for plus-size wearers.
 

 Occasion and Styling

  This luxurious, eye-catching gown is perfectly suited for high-stakes formal events:
  • Black-Tie Weddings (as a guest or bridal party member)
  • Formal Gala Dinners
  • Major Holiday Celebrations (e.g., Eid, Christmas)
  • Anniversaries or Milestone Birthdays
Styling Tip: Pair with simple gold or silver accessories to let the richness of the green and the sparkle of the sequins truly take center stage.

title: The Royal Heirloom
description:
Exude grace and sophistication in this majestic Champagne Evening Gown, designed to offer a perfect blend of comfort and high-fashion elegance. This floor-length dress is crafted from soft, flowing chiffon fabric that drapes beautifully, creating a stately and statuesque silhouette. 
The standout feature of this gown is the dramatic floor-length cape sleeves, which add regal movement and a touch of drama to your look. The bodice is adorned with exquisite white embroidery and intricate beadwork in a swirling, baroque-inspired pattern that extends gently past the waist, elongating the figure. 
With its modest high neckline and fully lined design, this dress is an ideal choice for curvy figures and modest fashion enthusiasts. It is perfect for weddings, engagement parties, or any formal event where you want to make a lasting, angelic impression. 
 
 
   
Color: Soft Champagne / Beige with White detailing. 
 
   
Fabric: Lightweight, flowy Chiffon/Georgette for a graceful drape. 
 
   
Design Details: Stunning floor-length cape-style sleeves (split sleeve design). 
 
   
Embellishment: Heavy white embroidery and beading on the chest and waist. 
 
   
Silhouette: Relaxed A-line column cut that flatters all body types. 
 
   
Modesty: High round neckline with full coverage. 
 
   
Occasion: Ideal for Mother of the Bride, Katb Kitab, or formal evening galas.

The standout feature of this gown is the dramatic floor-length cape sleeves, which add regal movement and a touch of drama to your look. The bodice is adorned with exquisite white embroidery and intricate beadwork in a swirling, baroque-inspired pattern that extends gently past the waist, elongating the figure.

With its modest high neckline and fully lined design, this dress is an ideal choice for curvy figures and modest fashion enthusiasts. It is perfect for weddings, engagement parties, or any formal event where you want to make a lasting, angelic impression.

  • Color: Soft Champagne / Beige with White detailing.

  • Fabric: Lightweight, flowy Chiffon/Georgette for a graceful drape.

  • Design Details: Stunning floor-length cape-style sleeves (split sleeve design).

  • Embellishment: Heavy white embroidery and beading on the chest and waist.

  • Silhouette: Relaxed A-line column cut that flatters all body types.

  • Modesty: High round neckline with full coverage.

  • Occasion: Ideal for Mother of the Bride, Katb Kitab, or formal evening galas.

title: Forest Glamour
description:
Step into luxury with this breathtaking Emerald Green Evening Gown, designed for the woman who seeks elegance and modesty. Crafted from high-quality, lustrous satin fabric, this floor-length dress features a sophisticated high neckline and tailored long sleeves, making it perfect for hijab-friendly fashion or formal occasions. 
The highlight of this gown is the intricate silver beadwork and embroidery featuring a delicate leaf and vine motif. The embellishments cascade gracefully from the shoulder and accentuate the waist, creating a stunning hourglass effect. The bodice features a unique diagonal pleated drape that adds texture and modern flair, while the flowing A-line skirt ensures graceful movement with every step. 
Whether you are attending a wedding, a gala, or a special evening event, this dress promises to make you feel regal and confident. 
 
 
   
Color: Deep Emerald / Forest Green. 
 
   
Fabric: Premium Satin with a soft sheen and fluid drape. 
 
   
Design Details: Hand-placed silver crystal and bead embroidery in a botanical vine pattern. 
 
   
Silhouette: Flattering A-line cut with a fitted waist and flowing skirt. 
 
   
Bodice: Features an asymmetrical pleated sash design for added structure. 
 
   
Modesty: Full coverage with a high round neck and long fitted sleeves. 
 
   
Occasion: Perfect for weddings, engagement parties, formal dinners, and Eid celebrations.
variant: 'product-condition:New — Styliiiish Certified🔥/Used – Very Good — Styliiiish Certified ❤️:Used – Very Good — Styliiiish Certified ❤️'

The bodice features a unique diagonal pleated drape that adds texture and modern flair, while the flowing A-line skirt ensures graceful movement with every step.

Whether you are attending a wedding, a gala, or a special evening event, this dress promises to make you feel regal and confident.

  • Color: Deep Emerald / Forest Green.

  • Fabric: Premium Satin with a soft sheen and fluid drape.

  • Design Details: Hand-placed silver crystal and bead embroidery in a botanical vine pattern.

  • Silhouette: Flattering A-line cut with a fitted waist and flowing skirt.

  • Bodice: Features an asymmetrical pleated sash design for added structure.

  • Modesty: Full coverage with a high round neck and long fitted sleeves.

  • Occasion: Perfect for weddings, engagement parties, formal dinners, and Eid celebrations.

title: Serenity Cascade
description: Introducing “The Serenity Cascade,” an exquisite full-length Abaya that redefines modest luxury.Crafted from premium, flowing Navy Blue Chiffon, this gown features a breathtaking double-layered cape-style bodice (Bisht) which drapes elegantly over the main dress, providing a flattering and airy silhouette. The key highlight is the delicate Hand-Embroidered butterfly (or winged) motif applied meticulously across the cape and trailing down the skirt, showcasing true artisanal craftsmanship.The cape is further accentuated with a stunning border of intricate silver/gray embroidery along the trim, adding a touch of sophisticated sparkle. The overall effect is one of ethereal grace, perfect for making a stylish yet subdued statement.This versatile Modest Kaftan is ideal for Eid celebrations, formal dinners, luxury travel, and special occasions where comfort and high-end modesty are paramount. title: Off-White Chiffon Dress
description:
Graceful Design for Special Occasions 
The Off-White Chiffon and Embroidered Fabric Dress is designed to celebrate elegance and sophistication, making it the perfect choice for the mothers of the bride and groom during a wedding ceremony. Crafted with premium chiffon and delicate embroidery, this dress radiates understated glamour while offering timeless beauty. Its off-white hue complements a variety of wedding themes, ensuring you shine effortlessly on your loved one's special day. 
Exceptional Comfort and Quality 
Beyond appearance, comfort is key for special event attire. This gown features a lightweight chiffon base that drapes beautifully, offering breathable and graceful wear throughout the celebration. The exquisite embroidery adds delicate texture and intricate detail, enhancing the overall sophistication without compromising on comfort. Whether standing for photos, toasting loved ones, or mingling with guests, you’ll feel confident and at ease in this exceptional dress. 
A Versatile Choice for Every Style 
The Off-White Chiffon and Embroidered Fabric Dress stands out for its remarkable versatility. Designed to suit a variety of body types, the flowing silhouette creates an elegant shape. Its neutral color and tasteful accents pair well with a range of accessories, allowing you to personalize your look. Add a statement necklace, earrings, or a soft shawl to make the outfit uniquely yours. Whether the wedding is indoors, outdoors, formal, or semi-formal, this dress ensures you'll exude timeless grace.

title: Burgundy Chiffon Dress
description:
Refined Elegance in Every Detail 
Introduce a touch of sophistication to your wardrobe with our exquisite burgundy chiffon dress, featuring hand embroidery for unmatched elegance. Designed to captivate, this dress combines delicate craftsmanship with a classy aesthetic, making it perfect for special occasions or refined evening wear. The rich burgundy tone ensures that you stand out while maintaining a timeless sense of style. 
Premium Quality and Exceptional Craftsmanship 
This dress is constructed with premium chiffon fabric to deliver a light, airy feel while offering elegance in motion. The intricate hand embroidery adds a personal touch, showcasing attention to detail and artisanal expertise. title: Embroidered Fabric & Fashion Dress
description:
Discover the perfect blend of elegance and style with our embroidered fabric and fashion dress. Designed to add sophistication to any wardrobe, this dress is an embodiment of refined craftsmanship and effortless beauty. Whether you're dressing for a casual outing or a formal event, this versatile piece promises to become your go-to option. 
Intricate Embroidery for Timeless Charm 
The embroidered detailing on this fashion dress is its standout feature. Each design is carefully crafted to bring out intricate patterns that exude an aura of timeless charm. Whether it's bold floral designs or subtle abstract shapes, every inch of embroidery is meticulously stitched to elevate the overall look and feel of the fabric. 
Luxurious Fabric for Unmatched Comfort 
Comfort is as important as looks, and that’s why this dress is made from high-quality, breathable fabric. It feels soft against the skin and offers an excellent fit, ensuring you stay comfortable all day long. The luxurious texture of the material adds a premium touch that complements the embroidered designs beautifully. 
Versatile Style for Every Occasion 
Whether paired with heels for a formal gathering or dressed down with sneakers for a casual outing, this embroidered fabric and fashion dress doubles as a versatile piece for every occasion. The thoughtful design and adaptable styling options make it a wardrobe essential that can keep up with your dynamic lifestyle. 
 
A perfect mix of beauty, comfort, and versatility, this dress isn't just another outfit—it’s an expression of style and individuality. Explore the elegance of the embroidered fabric and fashion dress today!

title: Off-White Chiffon Dress
description:
Graceful Design for Special Occasions 
The Off-White Chiffon and Embroidered Fabric Dress is designed to celebrate elegance and sophistication, making it the perfect choice for the mothers of the bride and groom during a wedding ceremony. Crafted with premium chiffon and delicate embroidery, this dress radiates understated glamour while offering timeless beauty. Its off-white hue complements a variety of wedding themes, ensuring you shine effortlessly on your loved one's special day. 
Exceptional Comfort and Quality 
Beyond appearance, comfort is key for special event attire. This gown features a lightweight chiffon base that drapes beautifully, offering breathable and graceful wear throughout the celebration. The exquisite embroidery adds delicate texture and intricate detail, enhancing the overall sophistication without compromising on comfort. Whether standing for photos, toasting loved ones, or mingling with guests, you’ll feel confident and at ease in this exceptional dress. 
A Versatile Choice for Every Style 
The Off-White Chiffon and Embroidered Fabric Dress stands out for its remarkable versatility. Designed to suit a variety of body types, the flowing silhouette creates an elegant shape. Its neutral color and tasteful accents pair well with a range of accessories, allowing you to personalize your look. Add a statement necklace, earrings, or a soft shawl to make the outfit uniquely yours. Whether the wedding is indoors, outdoors, formal, or semi-formal, this dress ensures you'll exude timeless grace.

The Off-White Chiffon and Embroidered Fabric Dress is designed to celebrate elegance and sophistication, making it the perfect choice for the mothers of the bride and groom during a wedding ceremony. Crafted with premium chiffon and delicate embroidery, this dress radiates understated glamour while offering timeless beauty. Its off-white hue complements a variety of wedding themes, ensuring you shine effortlessly on your loved one's special day.
Exceptional Comfort and Quality
Beyond appearance, comfort is key for special event attire. This gown features a lightweight chiffon base that drapes beautifully, offering breathable and graceful wear throughout the celebration. The exquisite embroidery adds delicate texture and intricate detail, enhancing the overall sophistication without compromising on comfort. Whether standing for photos, toasting loved ones, or mingling with guests, you’ll feel confident and at ease in this exceptional dress.
A Versatile Choice for Every Style
The Off-White Chiffon and Embroidered Fabric Dress stands out for its remarkable versatility. Designed to suit a variety of body types, the flowing silhouette creates an elegant shape. Its neutral color and tasteful accents pair well with a range of accessories, allowing you to personalize your look. Add a statement necklace, earrings, or a soft shawl to make the outfit uniquely yours. Whether the wedding is indoors, outdoors, formal, or semi-formal, this dress ensures you'll exude timeless grace.

title: Burgundy Chiffon Dress
description:
Refined Elegance in Every Detail 
Introduce a touch of sophistication to your wardrobe with our exquisite burgundy chiffon dress, featuring hand embroidery for unmatched elegance. Designed to captivate, this dress combines delicate craftsmanship with a classy aesthetic, making it perfect for special occasions or refined evening wear. The rich burgundy tone ensures that you stand out while maintaining a timeless sense of style. 
Premium Quality and Exceptional Craftsmanship 
This dress is constructed with premium chiffon fabric to deliver a light, airy feel while offering elegance in motion. The intricate hand embroidery adds a personal touch, showcasing attention to detail and artisanal expertise. Every bead and stitch is thoughtfully placed, creating a refined yet understated design that enhances the beauty of the wearer. 
For Every Memorable Occasion 
Whether attending a wedding, formal event, or celebratory dinner, this burgundy chiffon dress is designed to align perfectly with your finest moments. Its flattering fit and flowing silhouette ensure comfort while maintaining a poised and polished look. Dress it up with statement accessories, or keep it simple and let its unique design shine on its own. 
 
Experience the harmony of elegant design and superior quality with our burgundy chiffon dress with hand embroidery—a masterpiece that deserves a place in your collection. Make your choice today for a garment that combines beauty, comfort, and exclusivity all in one.

title: Elegant Black Chiffon Dress
description:
Unveiling Elegance: The Ultimate Black Chiffon Dress 
Discover a timeless piece of sophistication with this black chiffon dress, adorned with exquisite hand embroidery. Perfect for formal events, special gatherings, or an elevated evening look, this dress is designed to make you feel effortlessly chic while providing unmatched comfort. With its luxurious fabric and intricate detailing, this chiffon dress strikes the perfect balance between elegance and individual style. 
Quality Craftsmanship in Every Stitch 
Crafted from premium chiffon, this dress showcases lightweight fabric that flows beautifully and drapes gracefully. The hand embroidery is a testament to the skill and dedication of artisans, ensuring that each design element adds to the exclusivity of this gown. Whether up close or admired from afar, the craftsmanship is evident, making this dress not just clothing, but a true piece of art. 
Why This Black Dress is a Wardrobe Essential 
The black color makes it universally flattering, suitable for all seasons, and an essential addition to any wardrobe. Its versatile style allows it to be paired with statement accessories for a bold look or kept simple for a minimalist aesthetic. Chiffon fabric ensures breathability and lightweight wear throughout the day or night, while hand embroidery adds a touch of luxury that sets this black dress apart from the ordinary. 
 
Invest in a dress that’s as distinctive as your personality. Feel poised and confident in a design that celebrates femininity with a modern, refined twist. Make this hand-embroidered chiffon black dress the highlight of your collection today. You deserve elegance that doesn’t compromise on comfort or quality.

title: Elegant Large Size Dress
description: Discover the Perfect FitFinding a dress that feels comfortable, accentuates your style, and fits perfectly can be challenging. Our Elegant Large Size Dress is designed with all body shapes in mind, offering a combination of class and practicality for women who embrace their unique beauty. Made from high-quality materials, this dress ensures breathability and flexibility while exuding sophistication and elegance.Effortless Style for Every OccasionWhether you’re attending a formal event, heading out for a casual dinner, or just enjoying a relaxed outing, this large size dress is versatile enough to suit any occasion. Its elegant design features a flattering silhouette with intricate details that create an effortlessly chic look. The flowing fabric drapes beautifully to enhance your natural curves without sacrificing comfort.Why Choose Our Large Size Dress?A stylish outfit isn’t just about looking good; it’s also about feeling confident. With our large size dress, you’ll experience confidence that comes from knowing your outfit is tailored to your needs. The dress comes in a range of sizes designed specifically for women who want to make a statement, without compromising on comfort. Customers love the thoughtful fit and timeless design, making it a wardrobe favorite that pairs seamlessly with your existing accessories.Elevate your wardrobe with the Elegant Large Size Dress today, and embrace the best of fashion tailored just for you.

title: Elegant Cape Sleeve Modest Evening Dress
description:
Product Description: The Majestic Modest Cape Gown 
  
 
Make a regal and unforgettable statement in this stunning modest evening dress. Crafted from a sumptuous, flowing champagne satin fabric, this gown is the epitome of sophistication and grace. It flawlessly combines traditional modesty with high-fashion drama, making it the perfect choice for the most exclusive events. 
 
  
 Design Highlights & Features 
  
 
  Dramatic Cape Sleeves: The defining feature of this gown is the magnificent flowing cape sleeves. Starting at the shoulder, the fabric drapes down gracefully to create an ethereal and majestic silhouette, offering full coverage without sacrificing style. 
  Intricately Embellished Bodice: The high-neck, fitted bodice is heavily adorned with exquisite beading and detailed embroidery. These handcrafted embellishments catch the light beautifully, providing a touch of luxury and sparkle that eliminates the need for excessive jewelry. 
  Elegant Modesty: Designed for complete coverage, the dress features a high neckline (mock neck) and full-length coverage, ensuring comfort and adherence to modest dressing standards while maintaining a glamorous aesthetic. 
  Flattering A-Line Silhouette: The dress cinches gently at the natural waistline before flowing into a voluminous A-line skirt. This universally flattering shape drapes beautifully over the hips and thighs, creating a slimming and elegant profile perfect for plus-size figures. 
 
  
 Occasion and Styling 
  
 
This luxurious gown is ideal for significant formal occasions where you want to make a lasting impression: 
 
  Weddings (especially as Mother-of-the-Bride or Groom, or as a distinguished guest) 
  Formal Galas and Charity Events 
  Engagement Parties and Henna Nights 
  Proms or Formal Military Balls 
 
Care Instructions: Due to the delicate beading and satin fabric, we recommend professional dry cleaning only to preserve the integrity and shine of the gown.

Product Description: The Majestic Modest Cape Gown

  Make a regal and unforgettable statement in this stunning modest evening dress. Crafted from a sumptuous, flowing champagne satin fabric, this gown is the epitome of sophistication and grace. It flawlessly combines traditional modesty with high-fashion drama, making it the perfect choice for the most exclusive events.  

 Design Highlights & Features

 
  • Dramatic Cape Sleeves: The defining feature of this gown is the magnificent flowing cape sleeves. Starting at the shoulder, the fabric drapes down gracefully to create an ethereal and majestic silhouette, offering full coverage without sacrificing style.
  • Intricately Embellished Bodice: The high-neck, fitted bodice is heavily adorned with exquisite beading and detailed embroidery. These handcrafted embellishments catch the light beautifully, providing a touch of luxury and sparkle that eliminates the need for excessive jewelry.
  • Elegant Modesty: Designed for complete coverage, the dress features a high neckline (mock neck) and full-length coverage, ensuring comfort and adherence to modest dressing standards while maintaining a glamorous aesthetic.
  • Flattering A-Line Silhouette: The dress cinches gently at the natural waistline before flowing into a voluminous A-line skirt. This universally flattering shape drapes beautifully over the hips and thighs, creating a slimming and elegant profile perfect for plus-size figures.
 

 Occasion and Styling

  This luxurious gown is ideal for significant formal occasions where you want to make a lasting impression:
  • Weddings (especially as Mother-of-the-Bride or Groom, or as a distinguished guest)
  • Formal Galas and Charity Events
  • Engagement Parties and Henna Nights
  • Proms or Formal Military Balls
Care Instructions: Due to the delicate beading and satin fabric, we recommend professional dry cleaning only to preserve the integrity and shine of the gown.
